leorawrites: I live in NY but while in London, I happened along the Millenium Bridge, without knowing its name at the time. It was a super depressing day for me and I was solo traveling--which I normally LOVE and THRIVE ON--but it was right before the holidays and everyone around me was with someone. I felt exceptionally lonely. And then I walked across the bridge and felt this wave of gratitude come over me. I thought, "Girl, you're in London--a city you've fantasized about; so much charm and ridiculous urban beauty it borders on arcane!" I found it difficult to maintain the pity party I had so keenly set up for myself all thanks to a little walk
